data.title: Paul-Henri Spaak
data.text:
Passport

FR

EN

Share

Date and place of birth

25/01/1899 in Brussels (Belgium)

Date and place of death

31/07/1972 in Brussels (Belgium)

Nationality

Belgian

Offices held

Socialist MP for Brussels (1932–1957; 1961–1966)

Foreign Minister (1936-1939; 1939-1940; 1954-1957)

Prime Minister (1938-1939; 1946–1949)

President of the UN General Assembly (1946)

President of the Consultative Assembly of the Council of Europe (1949–1951)

President of the ECSC Common Assembly (1952–1954)

Chairman of a working party established at the 1955 Messina Conference and entrusted with the preparation of a report on the creation of a common European market (Spaak Report) (1955)

Secretary-General of NATO (1957–1961)

Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister (1961–1966)
